0.8.0.name: wordpress/s8-private-pages
0.8.0.description:
Allows admins to create private pages (a custom post type) for a specific user that only that user and admins can access. Other users that do not "own" the page are redirected to the home page or to their "own" private page (if one exists).

You also have the ability to change the URL endpoint, so instead of "http://example.com/private/PAGE-NAME" you can make it "http://example.com/client-access/PAGE-NAME", for example.

Support/Help

We have tutorial videos available on our site and are constantly working on adding more and keeping them up to date as needed. Click here to visit our tutorials page.
